associatewhatsappbusinessaccount.name: AssociateWhatsAppBusinessAccount
associatewhatsappbusinessaccount.description: Grants permission to associate a WhatsApp Business Account with your AWS account

createwhatsappmessagetemplate.name: CreateWhatsAppMessageTemplate
createwhatsappmessagetemplate.description: Grants permission to create a WhatsApp message template

createwhatsappmessagetemplatefromlibrary.name: CreateWhatsAppMessageTemplateFromLibrary
createwhatsappmessagetemplatefromlibrary.description: Grants permission to create a WhatsApp message template from Meta's template library

createwhatsappmessagetemplatemedia.name: CreateWhatsAppMessageTemplateMedia
createwhatsappmessagetemplatemedia.description: Grants permission to create media for WhatsApp message templates

deletewhatsappmessagemedia.name: DeleteWhatsAppMessageMedia
deletewhatsappmessagemedia.description: Grants permission to delete a media object from WhatsApp

deletewhatsappmessagetemplate.name: DeleteWhatsAppMessageTemplate
deletewhatsappmessagetemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a WhatsApp message template

disassociatewhatsappbusinessaccount.name: DisassociateWhatsAppBusinessAccount
disassociatewhatsappbusinessaccount.description: Grants permission to disassociate a WhatsApp Business Account from your AWS account

getlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccount.name: GetLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccount
getlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccount.description: Grants permission to view the details of a WhatsApp Business Account

getlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccountphonenum.name: GetLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccountPhoneNumber
getlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccountphonenum.description: Grants permission to view the details of a phone number

getwhatsappmessagemedia.name: GetWhatsAppMessageMedia
getwhatsappmessagemedia.description: Grants permission to get a media object from WhatsApp

getwhatsappmessagetemplate.name: GetWhatsAppMessageTemplate
getwhatsappmessagetemplate.description: Grants permission to get details of a WhatsApp message template

listlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccounts.name: ListLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccounts
listlinkedwhatsappbusinessaccounts.description: Grants permission to view all of your WhatsApp Business Accounts

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

listwhatsappmessagetemplates.name: ListWhatsAppMessageTemplates
listwhatsappmessagetemplates.description: Grants permission to list WhatsApp message templates

listwhatsapptemplatelibrary.name: ListWhatsAppTemplateLibrary
listwhatsapptemplatelibrary.description: Grants permission to list available templates from Meta's template library

postwhatsappmessagemedia.name: PostWhatsAppMessageMedia
postwhatsappmessagemedia.description: Grants permission to upload a media object to WhatsApp

putwhatsappbusinessaccounteventdestinati.name: PutWhatsAppBusinessAccountEventDestinations
putwhatsappbusinessaccounteventdestinati.description: Grants permission to update a WhatsApp Business Accounts event destination

sendwhatsappmessage.name: SendWhatsAppMessage
sendwhatsappmessage.description: Grants permission to send a message through WhatsApp

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add a tag to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource

updatewhatsappmessagetemplate.name: UpdateWhatsAppMessageTemplate
updatewhatsappmessagetemplate.description: Grants permission to update a WhatsApp message template
